check.name: TypeBodyPadding
check.description: Checks the padding policy for type bodies. Ensures that a blank line is present immediately after the opening brace and/or immediately before the closing brace of type definitions: (class, interface, enum, record, and annotation types).

property.name: allowEmpty
property.description: Control whether to allow empty type bodies without padding.

property.name: ending
property.description: Control whether padding is required at the end of the body.

property.name: skipInner
property.description: Control whether to skip checking of inner types.

property.name: skipLocal
property.description: Control whether to skip checking of local types.

property.name: starting
property.description: Control whether padding is required at the start of the body.
